summary: Updated Instagram section to match Figma design. Increased Instagram logo size to 212px x 209px on desktop (from 97px x 99px). Updated text styling to match Figma specs (font-size 24px, line-height 46px). Improved responsive design with proper breakpoints. Updated button styling and spacing to match Figma design.
current_status: Instagram section updated to match Figma design specifications. Logo size, typography, and layout now match the design. Ready for browser testing.
